short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the toolbar icon or Alt + Shift + W to save the page you're viewing to What a Great Link!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to easily save the pages you visit in Chrome to What a Great Link.  It's as simple as clicking the What a Great Link icon in the toolbar (or hit Alt + Shift + W), select who you want to show the link to, and click Save!
